name: Elder Sub
description:
This was a little game developed for the "Beneath the Surface" themed Ludum Dare 29 using GameMaker: Studio. The idea was to build a game like FTL that took place on a Cold War submarine.

I did everything except for the art, which was done by my buddy Killjoy (he's not really on social media, otherwise I'd link him). A full-featured version of the game was planned and in development but we ultimately decided to move on to other things.

Controls

  • Left Click - Select units
  • Right Click - Order units around

Note: Character stats have no effect. Also, this will probably never be updated again.
